frontmatter.title: Insights into Angular ng-template
frontmatter.description: Angular uses ng-template, ng-content extensively. It becomes sometimes confusing how to use this concepts and more importantly when to use it. We will see one of the use cases where ng-template and ng-content are helpful.

frontmatter.title: Its never too late
frontmatter.description: The great aim of knowledge of education is not knowledge but action.
